description: ICS techniques mitigated by Mechanical Protection Layers, ATT&CK mitigation M0805 (v1.0)
name: Mechanical Protection Layers (M0805)

techniques.comment: Protection devices should have minimal digital components to prevent exposure to related adversarial techniques. Examples include interlocks, rupture disks, release valves, etc. (Citation: A G Foord, W G Gulland, C R Howard, T Kellacher, W H Smith 2004)
